ygData.subject: Re: Re: Monk Loot and Modifications
ygData.msgSnippet: Was just wondering if the message actually got through since it seems no one listend to what I came from the horses mouth aka Verant this was at the show they
ygData.messageBody:
Was just wondering if the message actually got through since it seems no one
listend to what I came from the horses mouth aka Verant this was at the show
they were at. This came from ack can't remember his name its one of there
programmers. It will not happen that they change the colors until they
upper the specs of the game though in order to get the most money and be the
most compatible with the most machine you have to let that guy with a Voodoo
1 online as well as bleeding edge equipment. Its a marketing thing
therefore until they phase out older video cards the color scheme they have
is kinda stuck.

I did hear someone talking about Ashron's Call to be honest with you the
game is in kinda over head side view. The graphics are good but I feel
like they are missing the boat by not giving you the feel of being that
actual person.
